dcterms:description: The AIST++ dance movement dataset was constructed from the AIST dance video database. It provides 3D human keypoint annotations and camera parameters for 10.1 million images covering 30 different subjects in 9 viewpoints. The dataset contains 1,408 3D human dance movement sequences represented as joint rotations and root trajectories, evenly distributed across 10 dance genres and accompanied by corresponding music.
dcterms:title: AIST++
